Title: Apartment Hunters
Writer: Tami Sagher, Abbi Jacobson (creator), Ilana Glazer (creator)
Actors: Abbi Jacobson, Ilana Glazer, Tim Martin, Beth Dzuricky
Plot: Abbi is riding high after selling her art, but when Bevers pushes her to the breaking point, she starts the search for a new apartment. Meanwhile, Ilana is trapped in her own personal hell ...
